ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Ring Recommendation
ygData.msgSnippet: heh i didn t know the quest mob dropped the key, if that s what you mean. and that must be the dragon in skyshrine?  at the time, i was keeping up dragon
ygData.messageBody:
heh i didn't know the quest mob dropped the key, if that's what you mean.
and that must be the dragon in skyshrine? at the time, i was keeping up
dragon faction, now that has changed but couldn't kill him to get the key.
and it happened to be one of the most fun things i have done. first killing
for pla, then sneaking and invising and praying i could trade with the
questgiver without getting killed was a blast.

Shada

>
> Paying for a Cobalt Scar key is a waste (at least on Xegony)
> the room is
> usually camped - and the group will all have keys in a short while. I
> camped it once and gave out a bunch of keys.
>
> Slyde
